result.name: Your Choice of Acai Bowl or Specialty Bowl
result.description: Give yourself something to look forward as the weather heats up with today's acai bowl offer from the wellness gurus at Acai Brothers Manly. Take your pick from options like the Raw Notella Bowl topped with acai, cacao, banana and buckini, a Berry Nice Bowl with acai, banana, mixed berries, coconut yoghurt, berry sauce and buckini, and so much more!
result.inclusions: One acai bowl or one specialty bowl
result.whats_included:
- One regular acai bowl OR regular specialty bowl
- Available hours: Monday - Sunday: 8:00am-5:00pm
result.availability: Available hours: Monday - Sunday: 8:00am-5:00pm. Not valid special event days and public holidays
result.how_to_redeem: No bookings required - simply present your printed or smartphone voucher on arrival

fine_print.title: Conditions of the Deal
fine_print.body: Valid for new customers only. Menu items are subject to change. Limit of two vouchers may be purchased for personal use. Maximum of one voucher redeemable per visit. Vouchers for this offer are limited and subject to availability. Not valid with any other offer. Full terms and conditions are located on the terms and conditions page of our website

result.vendor_description: Famed for having the best acai bowls in town, Acai Brothers Manly churn out their signature blend from over 15 stores nationally! Whether you're after an acai bowl, smoothie, juice, raw treat or a caffeine fix, they've got just the thing for your next pick-me-up.
result.section_content:
__Acai Bowls__
- Original: acai, banana, buckini, plus your choice of three fruits
- Lemon Meringue: acai, banana, lemon essential oil, vanilla protein, buckini, plus your choice of three fruits
- Mocha Ya Socks Off: Acai, banana, cacao, espresso, buckini, plus your choice of three fruits

__Specialty Bowls__
- Mango Madness: acai, mango, coconut yoghurt, coconut water, mango sauce, buckini, plus your choice of three fruits
- Ain't Nothing Butter: acai, banana, raw peanut butter, PB sauce, cacao, cacao nibs, coconut yoghurt, choc buckini, plus your choice of three fruits
- Salted Caramel: acai, banana, salted caramel protein, coconut yoghurt, caramel sauce, choc buckini, plus your choice of three fruits

__[See the full menu here](https://scoopimages-static.s3.amazonaws.com/AcaiBrothersMenu.pdf) __
